verses.verse: Then Job<WH347> answered,<WH6030>
"I have heard<WH8085> many such things.<WH7227> You are all miserable<WH5999> comforters!<WH5162>
Shall vain<WH7307> words<WH1697> have an end?<WH7093> Or what provokes<WH4834> you that you answer?<WH6030>

I also could speak<WH1696> as you do.<WH3863> If your soul<WH5315> were<WH3426> in my soul<WH5315>'s place,<WH2266> I could join words<WH4405> together against you,<WH5128> and shake my head<WH7218> at you,<WH1119>
but I would strengthen<WH553> you with<WH1119> my mouth.<WH6310> The solace<WH5205> of my lips<WH8193> would relieve you.<WH2820>
"Though I speak,<WH1696> my grief<WH3511> is not subsided.<WH2820> Though I forbear,<WH2308> what am I eased?<WH1980>
But now,<WH3811> God, you have surely worn me out.<WH8074> You have made desolate all my company.<WH5712>
You have shriveled<WH7059> me up.<WH5707> This is a witness against me.<WH3585> My leanness rises up<WH6965> against me.<WH6030> It testifies to my face.<WH6440>
He has torn<WH2963> me in his wrath,<WH639> and persecuted<WH7852> me.<WH2786> He has gnashed on me with his teeth.<WH8127> My adversary<WH6862> sharpens<WH3913> his eyes on me.<WH5869>
They have gaped<WH6473> on me with their mouth.<WH6310> They have struck<WH5221> me on the cheek<WH3895> reproachfully.<WH2781> They gather<WH4390> themselves together against me.<WH3162>
God<WH410> delivers<WH5462> me to the ungodly,<WH5760> and casts me into<WH3399> the hands<WH3027> of the wicked.<WH7563>
I was at ease,<WH7961> and he broke me apart.<WH6565> Yes,<WH270> he has taken me by the neck,<WH6203> and dashed me to pieces.<WH6327> He has also set me up<WH6965> for his target.<WH4307>
His archers<WH7228> surround<WH5437> me.<WH6398> He splits my kidneys<WH3629> apart,<WH6398> and does not spare.<WH2550> He pours out<WH8210> my gall<WH4845> on the ground.<WH776>
He breaks<WH6555> me with breach<WH6556> on<WH6440> breach.<WH6556> He runs<WH7323> on me like a giant.<WH1368>
I have sewed<WH8609> sackcloth<WH8242> on my skin,<WH1539> and have thrust<WH5953> my horn<WH7161> in the dust.<WH6083>
My face<WH6440> is red<WH2560> with weeping.<WH1065> Deep darkness<WH6757> is on my eyelids.<WH6079>
Although there is no violence<WH2555> in my hands,<WH3709> and my prayer<WH8605> is pure.<WH2134>
"Earth,<WH776> don't<WH3680> cover my blood.<WH1818> Let my cry<WH2201> have no place to rest.<WH4725>
Even now,<WH5707> behold, my witness is in heaven.<WH8064> He who vouches<WH7717> for me is on high.<WH4791>
My friends<WH7453> scoff<WH3887> at me.<WH5869> My eyes pour out<WH1811> tears to God,<WH433>
that he would maintain<WH3198> the right of a man<WH1397> with God,<WH433> of a son of man<WH120> with his neighbor!<WH1121>
For when a few<WH4557> years<WH8141> have come,<WH857> I shall go<WH857> the way<WH734> of no return.<WH7725>
